code: @Test public void testAllowNullBodyTrue() throws Exception {     template.sendBody(getFtpUrl() + "&allowNullBody=true", null).     assertFileExists(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/allownull/allowNullBody.txt"). }

@Test public void testAllowNullBodyFalse() throws Exception {     try {         template.sendBody(getFtpUrl() + "&allowNullBody=false", null).         fail("Should have thrown a GenericFileOperationFailedException").     } catch (CamelExecutionException e) {         GenericFileOperationFailedException cause = assertIsInstanceOf(GenericFileOperationFailedException.class, e.getCause()).         assertTrue(cause.getMessage().endsWith("allowNullBody.txt")).     }     assertFalse("allowNullBody set to false with null body should not create a new file", new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/allownull/allowNullBody.txt").exists()). }
